radtraq.utils.range_correction¶

radtraq.utils.range_correction(data, height)[source]¶

Corrects reflectivity for range to help get the correct noise floor values

Parameters

  • data (xarray DataArray) – xarray data array

  • height (xarray DataArray) – Heights over which to correct the data for

Returns

data – Returns a range corrected variable

Return type

list
